attr.title: Magic Vigilante
attr.desc: This is a difficult bullet-hell shooter. There are 7+1 levels. Half of them are boss battles. Good luck!
attr.inst: Download game from https://nizakashii.itch.io/magicvigilante, copy data.win to /ports/magicviglante/gamedata
attr.inst_md: Download game from [nizakashii's itch.io page](https://nizakashii.itch.io/magicvigilante), copy data.win to /ports/magicviglante/gamedata
